revised_title: Lithium Niobate Devices in Optical Switching and Multiplexing
tldr: The article discusses the use of lithium niobate devices in optical switching and multiplexing for fiber-optic communication systems. These devices offer advantages in performing modulation, switching, and multiplexing functions in high-speed and low-speed systems. The author reviews the status of lithium niobate devices, their performance limitations, and potential applications, including multiplexing, demultiplexing, and network rearrangement.
